Institution Name: CALVARY COL. OF THEOLOGY, RUKPOKWU, PORT HARCOURT (AFFL TO UNICAL), RIVERS STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level subjects to include Religious Studies (CRS/IRS).
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and CRS/IRS.
Subjects: CRS/IRS and any other two (2) subjects.
